The primary objective evaluate real-world health outcome economic impact panitumumab treatment patient chemotherapy-refractory mCRC comparison SOC . The secondary objective confirm survival data , ass quality life patient assess health care resource utilization patient . Patients mutate KRAS gene treat standard-of-care ( SOC ) patient non-mutated ( wild type ) KRAS gene treat panitumumab . During course study , data collect quality life work productivity . Patients ask fill set questionnaire recruitment study every 3 month treatment initiation .
